description.base: A plant that is always green no matter the season.

extra.quality==excellent: It's emitting a faint golden glow, pulsing with latent energy.
extra.quality==good: Its rich scent is reminiscent of fresh earth and morning dew.
extra.quality==average: The leaves are lush and full, a testament to its resilience.
extra.quality==poor: Its leaves are wilted and dull, as if struggling to survive.

quality==excellent: You find a sagewort plant that is in perfect condition. You carefully harvest it, gaining some experience in herbalism.
quality==good: You find a sagewort plant that is healthy and vibrant. You harvest it, learning a bit about herbalism in the process.
quality==average: You find a sagewort plant that is in decent shape. You harvest it, gaining a little experience in herbalism.
quality==poor: You find a sagewort plant that is struggling to survive. You harvest it, but it doesn't teach you much.

quality==excellent: The sagewort has a crisp, refreshing taste with a hint of mint. A warm energy spreads through your body, invigorating you.
quality==good: The sagewort is slightly bitter but soothing. You feel a gentle warmth restoring your strength.
quality==average: The sagewort tastes earthy and herbal. It has a mild but noticeable revitalizing effect.
quality==poor: The sagewort is dry and slightly unpleasant, with a faintly sour aftertaste. It provides some relief, but not much.
